title: Palantir Q4 earnings beat Wall Street estimates on strong sales to US businesses
full_text: Palantir Q4 earnings beat Wall Street estimates on strong sales to US businesses. Palantir reported earnings after the bell Monday.. Palantir (PLTR) posted fourth quarter earnings and revenue above Wall Streets expectations on Monday, bolstered by sales to the Trump administration and US businesses. The companys revenue surged 70… [+2480 chars]
